name: My Lovely Pets Collector's Edition
description:
Play this colorful hidden object game and have a happy and peaceful weekend with your pets. Find over 100 adorable pets with our game “My Lovely Pets”
Search for interesting items in relaxing and beautiful places, play your favorite mini games, find cute Pets. This game has new interesting ways to find funny and playful pets and bright hidden objects, as well as a set of the most popular mini games.

This game with hidden objects and pets will give you a lot of pleasure. Use your skills and knowledge to play mini games and find all the hidden objects.

The collector 's edition includes:
- 8 additional locations - find even more cute pets!
- 8 additional new mini-games
- Beautiful desktop wallpapers
- Music player
- Store with cute pets.
